name: Jungle of Poems
description:
Jungle of Poems is a rhythm-runner and artistic experience set in the post-war ruins of 1971 Bangladesh. You play as a child orphaned by the war as they drift down a river in search of peace. 

There are two main settings for the game: the natural world and the dream world. Combat will be handled in a non-violent manner, using traditional Bengali dance poses to release divine energy and rid any enemies in the dream world.
